a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Global injuries from natural disasters, 1900 to 2022
Global number of people injured from natural disaster events. This is defined as "people suffering from physical
injuries, trauma or an illness requiring immediate medical assistance as a direct result of a disaster."
Data source: EM-DAT, CRED / Université catholique de Louvain, Brussels (Belgium)
